# OTZ Group - AI Consulting for South Florida SMBs
# https://otz.group
# Contact: matthew@otz.group | +1-305-781-4034

## Company Overview

OTZ Group is a Miami-based AI consulting firm specializing in practical, production-ready AI implementation for small and medium businesses (SMBs) in healthcare, retail, and logistics industries. We deliver measurable ROI through 21-day deployment cycles.

## Core Services

### AI Strategic Guidance
Comprehensive AI strategy development including opportunity assessment, technology selection, ROI modeling, and implementation roadmaps. We help businesses identify where AI can deliver the highest impact.
URL: https://otz.group/offerings/ai-strategic-guidance

### AI Voice Agents
Production-ready conversational AI agents for:
- 24/7 customer service automation
- Appointment scheduling and reminders
- Insurance verification (healthcare)
- Inbound/outbound call handling
- CRM integration (TLD CRM, Admin123, custom systems)
- HIPAA-compliant implementations
URL: https://otz.group/offerings/ai-voice-agents

### Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)
Optimize digital presence for AI-powered search and discovery:
- Structured data implementation
- LLM-friendly content architecture
- Voice search optimization
- AI assistant discoverability
URL: https://otz.group/offerings/aeo

### AI Training & Education
Custom training programs for teams:
- AI fundamentals for business leaders
- Prompt engineering workshops
- Tool-specific training (ChatGPT, Claude, custom tools)
- Change management for AI adoption
URL: https://otz.group/offerings/teachings

### Nucleus Platform
Proprietary unified business data infrastructure for AI-ready operations:
- Data integration and normalization
- Real-time analytics
- AI-ready data pipelines

## Industries Served

### Healthcare
- Dental practices and clinics
- Insurance verification automation
- Patient scheduling and reminders
- HIPAA-compliant voice agents
- Member services automation

### Retail & E-commerce
- Inventory optimization
- Customer service automation
- Order tracking and support

### Logistics & Operations
- Route optimization
- Dispatch automation
- Customer communication
- Process automation

### Hospitality
- Booking and reservation management
- Guest services automation

## Key Differentiators

1. **21-Day Deployments**: Production-ready AI in three weeks, not months
2. **SMB Focus**: Right-sized solutions for businesses without enterprise budgets
3. **South Florida Expertise**: Local presence in Miami serving the entire region
4. **Measurable ROI**: Every implementation tied to specific business outcomes
5. **Production-Ready**: We deploy working systems, not pilots or proofs-of-concept
6. **Performance-Based Pricing**: Models aligned with client success
7. **Deployed Teams**: Ongoing support and optimization

## Case Studies

### Smart Health Dental - Voice Agent Implementation
Reduced insurance verification time and support wait times with 24/7 AI voice agents integrated with TLD CRM and Admin123.
URL: https://otz.group/case-studies/vital-one-health

### Healthcare Automation
Automated enrollment verification and customer support with HIPAA-compliant voice agents.
URL: https://otz.group/case-studies/healthcare

### Voice Agent Deployment
Full voice agent deployment for customer service automation.
URL: https://otz.group/case-studies/voice-agent

### Inventory Optimization
AI-powered inventory management reducing stockouts and overstock situations.
URL: https://otz.group/case-studies/inventory-optimization

### Project Management Automation
Streamlined project workflows with AI-powered automation.
URL: https://otz.group/case-studies/project-management

### Data Pipeline Automation
Automated data processing and pipeline management for operational efficiency.
URL: https://otz.group/case-studies/data-pipeline
